root.name: Cyber Speedway
root.description: OverviewCyber Speedway is afuturistic racing game with minor emphasis on combat. It was released exclusively for Sega Saturn and is the sequel to CyberRaceÂ It was Rated K-A (ages 6 ) and supports 1-2 players. It Features music by the group "Bygone Dogs".CoursesThere are six courses throughout the game's storyline mode, of which only five are available on the "standard" setting. The final track can only be challenged on the "advanced" skill level.Round 1 - TerraRound 2 - Round 3 - VastitasRound 4 - NubesRound 5 - EvoflammasRound 6 -
